message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its true worth to be $15,000 to me. Considering its value to you is $12,000, I am willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to my usual pricing and provides an excellent opportunity for you to maximize your investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your business further. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this offer.
